note.p: Italian. Son of Antonio Mendola and Rosalia Cafisi of Favara, Italy. Studied at the Hoffwyl Institute, Berne, Switzerland, from the age of 8, and at Leipzig; later studied natural sciences at Stuttgart. Spoke several European languages, and learned Greek, Latin, and east Asian languages. Died of pneumonia contracted in a cold winter in Stuttgart.

Carmelo Antinoro, 2008, extract from Giustizia e verità nella vita del Barone Antonio Meldola, http://www.favara.biz/memorie_storiche/personaggi/personaggi_vari/baronello_mendola.htm (accessed 9 May 2018)
